content:
I am trying to learn more about QDM/FHIR based composite measures and how to develop them. Is there any online resource available for this type of measure. Thank you very much.

Regards,
Tien Thai
The best discussion of composite measures is the STU4 release of the CQL-Based HQMF IG.

There is a draft of that content in the QM IG continuous build: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/cqf-measures/composite-measures.html, which is a direct port of the content in the CQL-Based HQMF IG, but hasn't had a lot of cleanup applied yet. Composite measures are not yet fully supported within FHIR like they were within the HQMF/QDM-based measures.
